issues.suggestion: Use a consistent font and formatting throughout the document.
issues.category_explanation: The use of multiple font styles and sizes can make the text difficult to read.

issues.problematic_text: Tests d'intrusion de la plateforme confidentiel
issues.suggestion: Consider adding a brief description or context for this phrase to improve clarity.
issues.category_explanation: The text is unclear and may not be easily understandable.

issues.suggestion: Consider adding a definition or explanation for technical terms to improve accessibility.
issues.category_explanation: The use of jargon may make the text difficult to understand for non-experts.

issues.suggestion: Consider adding a table of contents or summary to provide an overview of the report's content.
issues.category_explanation: The lack of introductory information may make it difficult for readers to navigate the document.

issues.problematic_text: DOCUMENT CONFIDENTIEL Document appartenant à Forvis Mazars
issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing this to make it clearer what the document is about.
issues.category_explanation: The title is unclear and does not provide any information about the content of the report.

issues.suggestion: Consider explaining what 'confidentiel' means in this context.
issues.category_explanation: The use of jargon may confuse readers who are not familiar with the term.

issues.suggestion: Consider using a more consistent formatting for page numbers.
issues.category_explanation: The formatting of the page number is inconsistent with other pages.

issues.suggestion: Use a clear and concise label for this column instead of an asterisk (*) followed by ambiguous letters (A, I)
issues.category_explanation: The reader may be confused about the purpose of this column without further explanation
